cause.description:
This is the cause to which all honorable people must rally. The time to show our support and see to it that Seags finds that true love he needs is now. He is a time bomb of pleasure that is willing to explode in the heart and vagina of a worthy young lady.
1. The ladies don't know what they're missing.
2. The left hand's love making must be experienced.
3. He's just plain Horny!
cause.name: Get Seags A Girlfriend
